videoTitle: Your new business partner: Social Media
videoDescription: You donâ€™t need millions of followers to win on social media. Potential clients are watching! Check out the latest episode of the Million Dollar Agency with Ashley Bissing & learn to gain leads through social media!

then you also are dealing with the franchisees and the franchisees are very small business owners they're like local
business owners and they're marketing dollars are very precious and they they need to be looked after and so what the
way that we did that leaning into our strength of client intimacy is that when we would close a franchise business that
had let's say 30 locations we would dedicate an account manager to those 30 locations what I've
felt a few times when I'm working with like the franchise is that we we're not working
directly with the franchise or so that means that the franchisee is subject to limitations of the franchiser of like

so if you don't know Corey Cory was the CMO of Scorpion and Corey came on to

met not long ago we were both out at Event in San Diego and I had the
opportunity to hear you speak and I was just so impressed not only with the the
breath of knowledge but the way that you carry yourself for somebody that has hit big numbers and helped a lot of people

accepted the role uh I took my wife out to dinner and I was weighing scorpion
with one other opportunity that I had and and when I was kind of talking
through my wife like you know there's this company scorpion they sell websites um kind of a scrappy agency
then there's this other company that it's kind of more established bigger company and um I was kind of going back
and forth and thinking about it as I was sharing with my wife and meanwhile I didn't realize but as I was describing
it my wife was like well you're going to take the other company right the other opportunity because it's much safer and
you're it's much more established versus this Scrappy startup and then I eventually at towards the end of the the
